title: "Apple iPhone face recognition doesn't work for man with moko kanohi"
excerpt: "An Auckland man says Apple's face recognition technology does not work with his moko kanohi. Paaka Edwards saved up $2000 to buy an iPhone 13 Pro Max in November last year. He read up about the model before making the purchase and there was no mention of issues with facial markings,"
